properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL TO SOUTH AFRICA.
1. 55 FOOT VESSEL MUSSULO III, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD,
   REQUESTING ASSISTANCE VICINITY 36-28S 003-18E
   AT 120430Z DEC. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO  KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC CAPE TOWN, PHONE 272 1938 3300,
   E-MAIL: MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA OR CAPE TOWN RADIO,
   PHONE: 272 1551 2617, E-MAIL: MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.COZA.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3172/13.
